'''''On a Magic Carpet Ride''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the open world [[Time Trial Challenge]] located near the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Ashavan Realm]] next to the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The time trial challenge can be found here:
*: <gallery>
Achievement On a Magic Carpet Ride Location.png|Map Location
Achievement On a Magic Carpet Ride Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* The name and description are a reference to ''{{w|Aladdin}}''.
